name: Jimmy Phillips

name: Pamela Bailey
text: It was very clean with great servers. Very good pizza dining experience

name: B Dwight
text: My waiter was great. He was good with all the people.  I came right at 1100 for the buffet. It was really good food best pizza hut i have been too. I travel a lot and don't normally eat at pizza Hut any more because most are not good. Ones in smaller towns arent good. But this one is great. Will be back when i travel lets me

name: Tatum Lyles
text: I gave them two stars because they put out lots of pizza on the buffet. I took three away because the sign says $4.99 for a buffet, with purchase of a drink in tiny print. The waiter didn't even mention that when we ordered waters. Got to the front to pay $10 and was charged almost $15 .That's sneaky and we won't be back.

name: Nejuan Patterson
text:
The workers were very friendly.
The restaurant was very dirty and the kitchen ceiling was leaking. I was so nervous to eat here....
My pizza was good though.

name: Cindy Thielemann
text: Service was super.... There have been some improvement since the horrid last visit.... Food was fresh and hot but no tea.. No Pepsi.... No Ranch dressing... They did go to closest store and purchase some dressing... Brandy F. Was our waitress and she was super...

name: Brittany Wilkins
text: Great food. A little too short staffed though

name: kyle trice
text: Out of Pepsi and Dr pepper. The buffet has very little selection and the pizza is dried out from the heat lamps. It seems no one manages the food or does not follow protocols. Honestly the worst pizza hut I've eaten at but nice people... They just NEED managed.

name: Joshua Poole

text: Place was fairly empty when my husband and I arrived. He went to the bathroom and I stood at the door, directly across from their "Please wait to be seated" sign. Waitress ignored me. The girl at the counter ignored me. After about seven ‚Ä¶More

text: Stopped here on our way through. Got to the buffet and all the pizza was odd. Almost all of them had onions on them at first. Chicken alfredo had been there a while and was also dried up. Well we made do since we had been on the road ‚Ä¶More
